title: Senior AR Applications Engineer, Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with your physical space. Apple’s Vision Products Group (VPG) is looking for a Senior Applications Engineer to help push the limits on the next generation of interactive computing.
description: Apple makes the newest technologies accessible to create amazing user experiences. Engineers are expected to work quickly and smartly to help determine the viability of ideas and technologies. Ideal candidate should have a keen understanding of 3D applications and an ambition to explore new possibilities.
key_qualifications: 5+ years of experience in software development. Attention to detail, creativity and passion. Proficiency in a programming language such as C, C++, C#, Objective-C, Swift, etc. Experience doing rapid prototyping. Good intuition in making time vs. complexity tradeoffs.
education_experience: BS / MS / PhD in Computer Science OR equivalent degree OR equivalent experience.
additional_requirements: Experience developing 3D or AR/VR applications or games. Proficiency with Unity, Unreal, or similar 3D engines. Excellent understanding of the practical applications of 3D math and linear algebra.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay range for this role is between $166,600 and $296,300. Apple employees have opportunities for stock programs, benefits like medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and free services, educational reimbursement, discretionary bonuses, commission payments, and relocation.
